name: Elisha
description: Elijah's successor, performed twice the miracles. Healed Naaman, raised the dead, fed multitudes. Faithful servant who asked for double portion.

receiving-mantle.name: Receiving the Mantle
receiving-mantle.description: Catching Elijah's mantle as he ascends
receiving-mantle.expression: awe and determination, mantle of succession
receiving-mantle.prompt: reaching up to catch falling mantle as master ascends in whirlwind - chariot of fire in background, moment of succession, receiving double portion of spirit

healing-naaman.name: Healing Naaman
healing-naaman.description: Commanding the Syrian general to wash in Jordan
healing-naaman.prompt: standing at doorway gesturing toward river - not even coming out to meet the great general, giving simple instructions that healed leprosy, humble power

multiplying-oil.name: Multiplying the Oil
multiplying-oil.prompt: standing as widow pours oil into vessel after vessel - miracle of multiplication, saving her sons from slavery, provision that never stopped

raising-dead.name: Raising the Shunammite's Son
raising-dead.description: Stretching over the dead boy to revive him
raising-dead.prompt: stretched over child on bed - mouth to mouth, eyes to eyes, hands to hands, warmth returning to cold body, resurrection power

seeing-armies.name: Seeing the Heavenly Army
seeing-armies.description: Revealing the mountain full of horses and chariots of fire
seeing-armies.prompt: standing calm while servant fears - mountain behind filled with horses and chariots of fire, 'those with us are more than those with them', spiritual sight

striking-waters.name: Parting the Jordan
striking-waters.description: Using Elijah's mantle to part the waters
striking-waters.prompt: striking water with rolled-up mantle - Jordan parting before him, 'where is the God of Elijah?', proving succession, same power in new hands
